main event: A fast blue twinkling light was observed in the Lincoln Park-Ecorse area on December 5, 1962.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 8:45 CST and lasted for 2 minutes., The observer checked the area with binoculars., The light moved from east to west at a high speed., The conclusion of the report indicated insufficient information and possible astronomical causes., There was clear sky during the observation, which contributed to visibility.
witness description: The observer noted the light from a basement window and mentioned its fast movement.
